verses.verse: <S%H8104>Observe<s%> the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib,<s%> and <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> for in the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

You shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> and the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to dwell <S%H7931>there.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> no leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> with <S%H398>it.<s%> You shall eat unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> with it seven <S%H4682>days,<s%> even the bread of <S%H6040>affliction;<s%> for you came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in <S%H2649>haste:<s%> that you may <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> when you came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life.<s%>

No yeast shall <S%H7200>be<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> with you in all your <S%H1366>borders<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> neither shall any of the <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> which you <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> <S%H3885>remain<s%> all night until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
You <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> within <S%H259>any<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you;<s%>

but at the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to dwell <S%H2076>in,<s%> there you shall sacrifice the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> at the going <S%H935>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> at the <S%H4150>season<s%> that you came <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

You shall <S%H1310>roast<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose:<s%> and you shall <S%H6437>turn<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to your <S%H168>tents.<s%>

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread.<s%> On the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be a solemn <S%H6116>assembly<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H4399>work.<s%>

You shall <S%H5608>count<s%> for yourselves <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks:<s%> from the time you <S%H2490>begin<s%> to put the <S%H2770>sickle<s%> to the standing <S%H7054>grain<s%> you shall <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H5608>number<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7620>weeks.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H4530>tribute<s%> of a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> which you shall <S%H5414>give,<s%> according as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> blesses <S%H1288>you:<s%>

and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> and your son, and your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and your male <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and your female <S%H519>servant,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> who is within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> and the <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> who are in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H4725>you,<s%> in the place which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to dwell <S%H7931>there.<s%>
You shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> that you were a <S%H5650>bondservant<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> these <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tents<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> after that you have <S%H622>gathered<s%> in from your <S%H1637>threshing<s%> floor and from your <S%H3342>winepress:<s%>

and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H2282>feast,<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> and your son, and your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and your male <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and your female <S%H519>servant,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> and the <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> and the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> who are within your <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

You shall keep a <S%H2287>feast<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H977>choose;<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in all your <S%H8393>increase,<s%> and in all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and you shall be altogether <S%H8056>joyful.<s%>

<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> shall all your <S%H2138>males<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> which he shall <S%H977>choose:<s%> in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks,<s%> and in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tents;<s%> and they shall not <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7387>empty:<s%>
every <S%H376>man<s%> shall give as he is <S%H4979>able,<s%> according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which he has given <S%H5414>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> in all your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H7626>you,<s%> according to your tribes; and they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

You shall not <S%H5186>wrest<s%> <S%H4941>justice:<s%> you shall not <S%H5234>respect<s%> <S%H6440>persons;<s%> neither shall you <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe;<s%> for a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> does <S%H5786>blind<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and <S%H5557>pervert<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

You shall <S%H7291>follow<s%> that which is <S%H6664>altogether<s%> <S%H6664>just,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you.<s%>

You shall not <S%H5193>plant<s%> for yourselves an <S%H842>Asherah<s%> of any kind of <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> which you shall make for <S%H6213>yourselves.<s%>
Neither shall you set yourself <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H4676>pillar;<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8130>hates.<s%>
